Information

Drag to spin Drag to spin

General Information

Provides total oral care

Warnings

In case of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. Children under the age of 6 may use under the instruction of a dentist only if deemed necessary and safe.

Common Uses

oral health, teeth whitening, stain lifting

Ingredients

Calcium carbonate, Aqua, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Silica, Aroma, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Carboxymethyl Hydroxyethycellulose, Chondrus Chrispus, CI 77891, Sodium Saccharin, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Sodium Monofluorophosphate

Directions

Brush thoroughly twice daily for 2 minutes
